title: Holographic Stress Tensor for Kerr-AdS Black Holes and Local Failure on IR-UV Connection
abstract: We show that in general holographic stress tensor may contain a new term of divergence of a spacelike unit normal acceleration. Then, it is shown that in contrast to previous descriptions, a new stress tensor for Kerr-AdS solutions can be a traceless one. Interestingly, this prescription entails a local failure on the IR-UV connection.
